// <auto-generated/>
using System;
using System.Buffers.Binary;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Runtime.CompilerServices;
using System.Text;
using FourSer.Contracts;
using System.IO;
using FourSer.Gen.Helpers;

namespace Test;

public partial class PrivateCtorPacket : ISerializable<PrivateCtorPacket>
{
    public static int GetPacketSize(PrivateCtorPacket obj)
    {
        var size = 0;
        size += sizeof(int); // Size for unmanaged type Value
        return size;
    }

    private PrivateCtorPacket(int value)
    {
        this.Value = value;
    }

    public static PrivateCtorPacket Deserialize(System.ReadOnlySpan<byte> buffer, out int bytesRead)
    {
        var originalBuffer = buffer;
        var value = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.RoSpanReaderHelpers.ReadInt32(ref buffer);
        var obj = new PrivateCtorPacket(value);
        bytesRead = originalBuffer.Length - buffer.Length;
        return obj;
    }

    public static int Serialize(PrivateCtorPacket obj, System.Span<byte> data)
    {
        var originalData = data;
        FourSer.Gen.Helpers.SpanWriterHelpers.WriteInt32(ref data, (Int32)obj.Value);
        return originalData.Length - data.Length;
    }
}
